page.title: 13RECREATION, TOURISM
page.content: {RECREATION}in North Leverton is restricted by lack of facilities. People like to go swimming at Retford or Gainsborough Swimming pools, shooting over farm land or at a club. There is fishing in the Trent or canal. Some children go horse-riding, roller skating or going to the playing field for a game of football. There are others who prefer quieter things like reading or watching television. Retford Sports Centre is a popular place to go for squash, tennis, snooker and swimming. Some boys like to go out on a B.M.X bicycle. Cricket is played on the cricket field. {TOURISM}North Leverton is visited by many individuals and coach parties to see the working Windmill, especially school children. The pubs have a trade for food for visitors and locals.
